t: Amazon.com: Customer Questions & Answers
s: In my opinion the Prismacolor are ... Sanford Prismacolor. They seem to have better color saturation, consistency and solubility. I don't have an explanation for that other than perhaps the Sanford version is a student grade made with cheaper materials. I have been using and teaching private painting students for years and out of all the watercolor pencils I have tried (perhaps 8 or 9 different brands) these are ...

s: Sanford is the maker's name. So, yes, they are the same amazing pencils as everyone else's. The pencils are called Prismacolor Premier Pencils and they're all you expect from what you've heard about them, and so much more.

t: Prismacolor - Newell's or Sanford - Art Medium Discussion and Questions - The Artist's Community by The Virtual Instructor
s: July 14, 2020 - I ordered 2 tins of Prismacolor from Amazon (1 for me, one to give as a gift) and noticed that one pack (apart from being hideously bashed) was marked with the ‘sanford’ brand, while the other had the ‘Newell’s’ brand. Everything I read on forums etc refer to Sanford Prismacolor, ...
